DOC.brief_summary: Pilot Study Aerin Medical Wand use Improvement Nasal Breathing
DOC.detailed_description: This non-significant risk , prospective , non-randomized pilot study evaluate incidence serious adverse event directly attributable Aerin Medical Wand , use deliver radiofrequency ( RF ) energy tissue nasal airway treatment nasal obstruction .
DOC.criteria: Patients history Chronic nasal obstruction Poor nasal breathe Patients prior nasal history , nasal pathology , injury , and/or condition may interfere participation study
